title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 454.7 - Cancellation for violation by customer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 454.7 - Cancellation for violation by customer

State Regulations

Authority may cancel and terminate service under any service
tariff upon violation of the terms of service as set forth in this Part, in the
service tariff, in the accepted application for electric service, or in other
contract documents, provided, that authority shall not exercise its option to
cancel unless written notice and statement of any violation shall have been
given customer and customer afforded a period of at least 60 days in which to
cure such violation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
454.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
